body_html:
I think the most important ones are StorageSharing.cpp, and the multiprocessing reductions.

In the future please ask questions on our forums. We'll be happy to discuss implementation details there, but we'd like to keep issues for bug reports and feature requests only. Thanks!
body_text:
I think the most important ones are StorageSharing.cpp, and the multiprocessing reductions.
In the future please ask questions on our forums. We'll be happy to discuss implementation details there, but we'd like to keep issues for bug reports and feature requests only. Thanks!
body:
I think the most important ones are [`StorageSharing.cpp`](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/generic/StorageSharing.cpp#L191-L270), and the [`multiprocessing` reductions](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/multiprocessing/reductions.py#L91-L123).

In the future please ask questions [on our forums](discuss.pytorch.org). We'll be happy to discuss implementation details there, but we'd like to keep issues for bug reports and feature requests only. Thanks!
